body_html:
@mrry yeah that solved the problem. Now I am getting the following error message:

I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/master.cc:209] CreateSession still waiting for response from worker: /job:ps/replica:0/task:0
I get this error message for the non-chief workers. Does that mean that somehow workers 1 and 2 don't communicate properly with the ps?
body:
@mrry yeah that solved the problem. Now I am getting the following error message:

`
 I tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/master.cc:209] CreateSession still waiting for response from worker: /job:ps/replica:0/task:0
`
I get this error message for the non-chief workers. Does that mean that somehow workers 1 and 2 don't communicate properly with the ps?
